name: TonurSetArticle6

infos.name: Set-Artikel
infos.description:
Das Plugin "Set-Artikel" bietet Ihnen die Möglichkeit verschiedene Produkte in einem Set zusammenzuführen.
Im Plugin "Set-Artikel" haben wir sogenannte Slots hinzugefügt, die Sie mit Produkten belegen können. So können Sie Ihren Kunden die Möglichkeit bieten, ein Set selbst zu konfigurieren - Ideal für Geschenke, Schulutensilien u.v.m.


Features

  • Eigenständiges Produkt mit Bildern, Beschreibungen, Preise usw.
  • Slots mit Produkten belegbar
  • Variantenauswahl und Variantenausschluss für die Slots
  • Automatische oder manuelle Preisberechnung
  • Übersichtliche Darstellung im Warenkorb und auf der Produktseite
  • Optimierte Darstellung für Desktop & Mobile
  • Varianten von Sets mit verschiedenen Konfigurationen


Der Vorteil den ein Set-Artikel dabei hat, ist dass er ein eigenständiges Produkt ist. Mit eigenem Namen, Bildern, Beschreibungen, Preise usw.. 

Er wird wie ein ganz normales Produkt im Backend unter "Set-Artikel" angelegt.

Die Konfiguration eines Sets ist ganz einfach: Ein Produkt unter "Set-Artikel" erstellen, und anschließend im Reiter "Set-Config" die gewünschten "Slots" erstellen und bearbeiten.


Probleme?

Die meisten Fragen lassen sich bereits im Vorfeld klären. Aus diesem Grund bieten wir zu jedem Plugin ein Handbuch kostenlos zum Download an und haben zudem die häufigsten Fragen in unseren FAQs zusammengestellt.
Schauen Sie in unseren Supportbereich!

Hinweis

Jede Installation bzw. jedes Update eines Plugins in Ihrem Shopware Shop stellt eine Änderung der Software dar. Trotz unserer sowie von Seiten Shopware durchgeführter Maßnahmen zur Qualitätssicherung können wir daher nicht ausschließen, dass es während der Installation oder des Updates in Ausnahmefällen zu Problemen kommen kann.

Wir empfehlen grundsätzlich neue Plugins sowie das Einspielen von Updates von bereits installierten Plugins zunächst in einer geeigneten Testumgebung zu testen und diese nicht direkt in der Live-Umgebung einzuspielen sowie regelmäßig Backups Ihrer Live-Umgebung zu erstellen.

Über Repertus

Repertus ist ihr Softwareentwicklungs- und Dienstleistungsunternehmen mit Sitz in Berlin.
Unser Angebotsspektrum reicht von der E-Commerce Standardsoftware bis hin zu innovativen, individuell angefertigten Plugin Lösungen speziell auf Ihre Bedürfnisse und Anforderungen zugeschnitten.

Bitte sprechen Sie uns an.
infos.installationManual:
Einfach das Plugin über den Plugin-Manager installieren und falls erforderlich die Plugin-Einstellungen ergänzen.

Für weitere Details lesen Sie bitte unser Handbuch.
infos.shortDescription: Fassen Sie mehrere Artikel zu einem Set mit automatischer Bestandspflege zusammen.  Die Sets sind dabei eigenständige Artikel mit Namen, Beschreibungen und Bildern.

infos.name: Item set
infos.description:
The plugin "Item set" offers you the possibility to combine different products in one set.

In the plugin "Item set" we have added so-called slots, which you can assign products to. This gives your customers the possibility to configure a set by themselves - ideal for gifts, school utensils and much more.


Features

  • Independent product with pictures, descriptions, prices etc.
  • Slots can be filled with products
  • Variant selection and exclusion for the slots
  • Automatic or manual price calculation
  • Clear presentation in the shopping cart and on the product page
  • Optimized display for desktop & mobile
  • Variations of sets with different configurations


The advantage of a set article is that it is an independent product. With its own name, pictures, descriptions, prices etc.. 

It is created like a normal product in the backend under "Item set".

The configuration of a set is very easy: Create a product under "Item set" and then create and edit the desired "slots" in the "Set-Config" tab.


Problems?

Most questions can be answered in advance. For this reason, we offer a free manual for every plugin and have also compiled the most frequently asked questions in our FAQs.

Have a look at our support area!


Disclaimer

Every installation or update of a plugin in your Shopware Shop constitutes a change of the software. Despite our quality assurance measures implemented by Shopware, we can not rule out that problems may arise during the installation or the update in exceptional cases. We recommend testing new plug-ins and installing updates from already installed plug-ins in a suitable test environment, and not importing them directly into the live environment and regularly creating backups of your live environment.


About Repertus

Repertus is your software development and service company based in Berlin.
Our portfolio of services ranges from the standard e-commerce software to innovative, custom-made plugin solutions tailored to your needs and requirements.

Please contact us.

">
infos.installationManual: Simply install the plugin using the Plugin Manager and complete plugin options if necessary.
infos.shortDescription: Combine several products into a set with automatic stock management.  The sets are independent products with names, descriptions and pictures - perfect for gifts, school material etc.

comments.text:
Der Support antwortet super schnell, nimmt Feature-Wünsche mit auf und setzt Bugfixes sehr zeitnah um.
Das Plugin wirkt durchdacht und stabil.
comments.headline: Super Support - Stabiles Plugin

changelog.text: • new feature: added setting if the set item table should be displayed on the detail page

• fixed a possible problem when adding a set item to the shopping cart
  • new feature: added a setting for displaying the set configuration button
• Shopware 6.5 compatibility
• SW 6.5 Compatibility
• Fixes a possible problem whereby stocks were deducted multiple times
• Allows to search for set items in the administration
• New feature: Added setting to ignore visibilities on set-config page
• Compatibility with Shopware 6.4.17.x established
• Fixes an error when applying rules to sets
• Fixes a possible problem during uninstallation
• Established Shopware 6.4.12.0 compatibility
• Adaptations made for Pickware ERP

• Repeat orders with Set-Items in the customer account
  • Fixed the link in the order overview
• removed unused dependencies

• Compatibility with Shopware Customized Product established
  • Added compatibility with third-party plugin Xentral Business Booster.
  • Fixes an error in the administration of the order items for set items. The product or set link did not forward to the set. The bug fix is valid for future orders.
  • Fixes a possible error in the shopping cart regarding MaxPurchase (number of quantities)
  • General adjustments for Shopware from version 6.4.0.0
• Fixes a possible bug that could lead to the sales quantity being counted down twice.

• On the Set-Config page the slot image and the slot select button will be updated after selecting a product.
  • Added plugin setting that on the Set-Config page the first slot can be pre-selected/opened.
  • Added possibility to show the quantity count of the ingredients on the Set-Config page.
  • After adding a set to the cart, the detail page is called and then the OffCanvas cart is opened.
  • Added plugin setting "Hide prices in listing". If the option is enabled, the price calculation for sets does not take place in the listing/search and the prices are also hidden.
  • Fixes possible problems related to CMS elements.

• Administration: Fixed a possible problem that caused not more than 25 sets to be displayed.
  • Administration: Improved the filters in the listing.

• A problem has been fixed, whereby the discount field for sets was not displayed in the administration.
  • Free shipping is no longer overwritten based on the components. The value must be set manually by hand.

• More than 25 variants are now displayed in the slot config
  • Predefined sets can now be added directly to the shopping cart if the plugin setting is enabled
  • Prices of set components can now be hidden if plugin setting is enabled
  • The set configuration page now has the meta robot tag set to NoIndex
• Fixes a possible problem in the order process if the same set with a discount is available several times in the shopping cart.
• Provides compatibility with SW 6.4.5.1
• Fixes a possible problem in the order process if the same set with a discount is available several times in the shopping cart.
• Fixes a possible problem when adding set items to the shopping cart

• Resolves a possible issue where set items ignored the configured values for minimum & maximum purchase.
  • Resolves a possible issue where set items were listed incorrectly or not at all on delivery bills and invoices.
• Establishes compatibility with Shopware 6.4.4.0

• Fixes a bug in administration that occurs when a product is added to a slot and then removed again
  • Fixes an error in the calculation of the inventory
  • Compatibility with giftwrap and greeting card made
  • Establishes compatibility with PickwareErp and EasyCoupon in the administration

• A possible bug has been fixed in which predefined sets on the Set-Config page could not be added directly to the shopping cart.
  • Fixed a possible bug that could occur when saving a set.
  • The description of the sets is now correctly displayed on the configuration page.
  • In the administration you can now see the active information of a set component.
• Fixes a problem, where no sets were listed in the in the order confirmation e-mail.

• Provides compatibility with SW6.4.2.1
  • Duplication of set items is now prevented
  • Fixes possible problems with price calculation
• Provides compatibility with Shopware 6.4.
• Improved error handling in administration
• Improves compatibility with third plugins respect. creating set items.

• Hide the display "No products could be found" when the Set-Config page is initially called
  • A loading indicator is now displayed for actions on the Set-Config page
  • A possible problem on the Set-Config page is resolved that can occur when changing variants
  • Set-Config page: Selected variants are now displayed in the summary
• Fixes a possible problem that prevents installation
• Resolves a possible problem while deinstalling the plugin

• Fixes a possible problem with product variants 
  • Set articles can now have variants 
  • Set articles now contain custom fields in the frontend

• SW 6.3.4.1 compatibility established
  • New feature: Free text fields (payload data) of the set article are taken into account in the checkout process.
  • purchaseunit is no longer overwritten whilecalculating the stock
* Fixes a bug that prevented the administration from displaying more than 25 set items
* refactoring administration
• Fixes a possible bug, which meant that it was no longer possible to display the configured articles for a slot in the frontend.

• Fixes a possible problem that prevented the number of sets in the shopping cart from increasing 
  • Fixes a problem that caused the set item to appear on the order confirmation
• Fixes a possible problem that causes the migrations to run on an error when they are run a second time.
• Creates compatibility with Pickware Starter
• fixes a translation problem of the item set
• Establishes compatibility with Shopware 6.3.

• Standard products are now preselected in the frontend
  • Backend was revised
  • Price calculation was revised
  • Small bug fixes in the front & backend

• Fixes a possible problem that caused translations to be displayed incorrectly
  • Slot detail page has been adapted and now contains more setting options
  • Compatibility to gift wrap/greeting card has been established
  • Added possibility to hide the slot name in the frontend if a slot image is available
• Fixes a possible error that caused a item set to be saved only when adjustments were made to the product entity

• Fixes a possible error that caused the field errors in the backend not to be displayed correctly
  • Improved loading behavior of the slot detail page
• First version of our plugin Item set for Shopware 6.
